data.description:
"Quite a few titles claim to draw from the legendary Time Crisis... Tiger Blade is the closest yet" realovirtual

"An atypical approach to gameplay that raises excitement without feeling like just another combat-based VR game" Destructoid

VR WAS MADE TO MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE A BADASS
Unleash mayhem as you slash and blast through heart-pounding action scenes, leaving you feeling like an unstoppable killing machine.
"Annihilating swordsmen non-stop as if we were John Wick" Desconsolados

YOU ARE THE ACTION HERO
Dive into an intricately crafted alternate Korea, entangled in the visceral power struggles of the nation's most formidable gang. Battle your way to a neo-noir finale that'll leave you breathless.
"The feeling of really being in the shoes of a Korean assassin" PlayStation Bit

ANSWERING THE DEMAND FOR RIVETING ARCADE GAMES
Tiger Blade is highly replayable with online leaderboards, speedrunning, and more.
"Perfecting our skills has been wonderful" realovirtual

MUSIC THAT WILL HAVE YOU BOBBING YOUR HEAD
Slash and blow everything up to the beat of Korean hip-hop superstars SINCE, Bryn, Bruno Champman, and Kitsyojii 
"The soundtrack goes hard... it really does slap" Jammyhero

changelog.change_log:
Challenge mode now unlocks after « A precious package ».
Fixed a very rare softlock that could occur when dying.
Added a fade-in effect on interactive environment.

Hey Tiger Blade Warriors,

Hope you're all pumped up because we've got some killer updates for you!
Your passion and feedback have been off the charts, and we've been listening.
Get ready to dive into the action with our latest and greatest:

**New Challenges**
For all you hardcore players out there, we're dropping two fresh levels that'll make you sweat. Tackle these bad boys from the main menu, after taking down Kuki in the Docks. It's time to show off your skills and see if you've got what it takes.

**Graphics That Pop**
We've cranked up the visuals across the board. Expect smoother edges and crystal-clear clarity on your headsets. Quest 2, Quest Pro, and Quest 3 users, you're all in for a treat with 10%, 15%, and 25% resolution boosts, respectively.

**Control Freaks, Rejoice**
We've heard you loud and clear. Smooth turning on the left stick is now a thing. Move with finesse, and let your sword do the talking. And speaking of swords, parrying just got a whole lot smoother. Bullets won't know what hit 'em.

**Life's Easier Now**
No more guessing where you stand on the leaderboard. Your online ranking is front and center, so you know who the real boss is. Recentering issues? Consider them fixed. We've squashed bugs and optimized like crazy to make sure your gaming journey is as smooth as possible.

**Connect with Us**
Don't miss out on the chatter. Join us on Discord at [https://discord.gg/XD9w3GukAX](https://discord.gg/XD9w3GukAX). It's where the real warriors hang out.

Stay sharp, stay savage, and may the blades be forever in your favor.

Cheers,
Your Tiger Blade Squad
